I understand and embrace the role of the identity thief. 

The most satisfying part?  It's watching them scramble. Seeing that look of panic when they realize their life is falling apart, their money gone, their credit ruined...it's like a mirror reflecting back the pain they inflicted on me.  They took everything from me, my security, my future, my peace of mind. Now, I take it all from them. It's a twisted kind of justice, I know, but it's the only justice I've found.
